Uses of Package
org.openstreetmap.osm.data

Packages that use org.openstreetmap.osm.data
org.openstreetmap.osm.data Provides basic classes for loading, saving and storing OpenStreetMap-data 
org.openstreetmap.osm.data.searching Provides basic classes for searching for names and addresses in OpenStreetMap-data 
org.openstreetmap.osm.data.visitors Provides some visors to work with OpenStreetMap-data 
org.openstreetmap.osm.io Provides basic classes for loading and saving OpenStreetMap-data from the OpenStreetMap-Server and files 
 

Classes in org.openstreetmap.osm.data used by org.openstreetmap.osm.data
IDataSet
          DataSet is the data behind the application.
MemoryDataSet
          DataSet is the data behind the application.
NodeHelper
          This class stores all the functionality that we want for nodes but that is not included in the osmosis-way-class.
Selector
          Instances of this interface can filter a Set of Nodes or Ways.
TileCalculator.XyPair
          A pair of X and Y -tile-coordinated.
WayHelper
          This class stores all the functionality that we want for ways but that is not included in the osmosis-way-class.
